record.title: COMMITTEE ON HOMELAND SECURITY AND GOVERNMENTAL AFFAIRS RULES OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, pursuant to the requirements of rule XXVI, section 2, of the Standing Rules of the Senate, I ask unanimous consent to have printed in the RECORD the rules of the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs for the 110th Congress adopted by the committee on January 24, 2007.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
